title: In Search Of Alien Life? Seek Out The Smog
teaser: One of the worst byproducts of our industrial society is air pollution. It's a global problem that humans have yet to get under control. One scientist thinks we might not be alone, though. Alien civilizations may be polluting their worlds, and that pollution might be one way to detect them.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
